message.content:
cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.CY

This paper deals with clustering scientific publications based on citation relations, which is a common problem in the field of bibliometrics. The paper extensively studies the statistical properties of different clustering methods using various citation networks. This work involves network science techniques and is likely to be of interest to researchers in the fields of digital libraries (cs.DL), social and information networks (cs.SI), information retrieval (cs.IR), software engineering (cs.SD), and computational complexity (cs.CY).
